document.full_text: nigeria's ruling party has lost control of at least two states in governorship elections, according to results emerging on wednesday, although it performed strongly in some parts of the mostly-muslim north.
document.title: nigeria's ruling party loses some states after polls
lines_and_colors: nigeria's ruling party has lost control of at least two states in governorship elections, according to results emerging on wednesday, although it performed strongly in some parts of the mostly-muslim north.
